ygData.subject: Re: Good News... Maybe
ygData.msgSnippet: ... She ran after Archangle as fast as her little legs would take her. She growled and yelled after him. Hey, Wait up!  She was getting left behind fast.

::Trinity::

She ran after Archangle as fast as her little legs would take her.  
She growled and yelled after him. "Hey, Wait up!"  She was getting 
left behind fast.  She couldn't fly and was very small in size.  she 
ran, but she thought the fight would be over by the time she actually 
got there.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Arcangel/Sharpedge/Jetstorm:::
> 
> ::Uh-oh, he thoght::
> Arcangel: Um, were fighting FOR the Maximals...  Id better make you 
a maximal 
> again, and fast.
> ::He thought for a second.  no one could help now.  he doubted that 
anyone 
> would want to take on a problem less important than Dinobot's life::
> Arcangel: Aw man!  Listen kid, im taking you to the battle, but i 
dont want 
> to see you shooting other Maximals!
> ::he transformed to beast mode and flies out, hoping Trinity was 
following::
> --------------------------------------------------------------------
----------
> 
> ---------------------------------------------
> ::Sharpedge gets mostly hit in the arm.  He runs up to Bloodystrike 
and tries 
> to use his spinner hand on him.  Jetstorm gets hit in the chest by 
the rifle 
> shots, but dodges the missles.  he fires 25 rapid optci blasts and 
25 energy 
> blasts at Reptilica::
